column1: Little Goat Diner////If I can give it 10 stars I would. It was that amazing!!!! I got the Braden belly (their version of Benedict) with pork and eggs and this special sauce...so good!!! The meat was so tender!!!!!! We also had this mashed potatoes...tempura style and that was just perfect! Crispy on the outside
column2: nice and soft on the inside!!! Our server was very friendly and helpful! Really
column3: all our interaction with their staff was just great! Seats are comfortable
column4: very trendy decor inside! Ohhh and they serve breakfast
column6: and dinner all day!!! I would definitely come here again!!!!!!
